metadata.dc:description: We present the case of one patient: a male with rectal cancer, who underwent computed tomography (CT) and positron emisission tomography/computed tomography (PET/CT) with 18F-FDG to comfirm local recurrence of rectal cancer. The results of PET/CT confirms that there one a recurrence of rectal cancer.
metadata.dc:title: Valor de la PET/TAC para el diagn√≥stico diferencial de masa presacra.
[The value of PET/CT in the differential diagnosis of presacral mass].
